entry.value: import pandas as pd%%00010%%00010tb = input_table_2['Col0']%%00010%%00010md = {%%00010%%00009'org' : [],%%00010%%00009'ds_nazev' : [],%%00010%%00009'ds_url' : [],%%00010%%00009'resource' : [],%%00010%%00009'roky' : [],%%00010%%00009'tags' : [], %%00010%%00009'indikator' : [],%%00010%%00009'popis' : [],%%00010%%00009'licence' : [],%%00010%%00009'keywords' : [],%%00010%%00009'last_update':[]%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00010#z metadat konkretne%%00010ds_nazev = tb[0].split(':')[-1].strip()%%00010md['ds_nazev'].append(ds_nazev)%%00010%%00010last_update = tb[1].split(':',1)[-1].strip()%%00010md['last_update'].append(last_update)%%00010%%00010zdroj = tb[3].split(':')[-1].strip()%%00010md['org'].append(zdroj)%%00010%%00010time = [e for i,e in enumerate(tb) if i > tb.tolist().index('TIME') and i < tb.tolist().index('GEO')]%%00010md['roky'].append(time[0]+' - '+time[-1])%%00010%%00010keywords = [e for i,e in enumerate(tb) if i > tb.tolist().index('NRG_BAL') and i < tb.tolist().index('SIEC')]%%00010md['keywords'].append(", ".join(keywords))%%00010%%00010data_resource = flow_variables['data'].split("/")[-1].replace("Data_","")%%00010md['ds_url'].append(flow_variables['zdroj'].lower()+"-"+data_resource.lower().replace("_","-").replace(".csv",""))%%00010md['resource'].append(data_resource)%%00010%%00010if flow_variables['context.workflow.name'] in input_table_1['workflow.name'].values:%%00010%%00009#najde pozici pro toto workflow%%00010%%00009index_knwf = input_table_1.loc[input_table_1['workflow.name'] == flow_variables['context.workflow.name']]%%00010%%00009#vsechny nalezene priradi%%00010%%00009md['indikator']=list(index_knwf['indikator'])%%00010%%00009md['tags']=list(index_knwf['tags'])%%00010%%00010#url_zdroj zatim do popisu%%00010md['popis'].append('Zdroj dat: ' + flow_variables['url_zdroj'])%%00010md['licence'].append('')%%00010%%00010#doplnit missing%%00010mdMax = max(len(v) for v in md.values())%%00010for k, v in md.items():%%00010%%00009if len(v) < mdMax:%%00010%%00009%%00009v.extend(None for x in range(mdMax - len(v)))%%00010%%00010output_table = pd.DataFrame(md)%%00010%%00010meta_resource = "metadata_"+data_resource%%00010%%00010flow_variables['metadata'] = flow_variables['metadata_upload']+meta_resource%%00010
